name: Video Gale - Chapter One
description:
NOTE: This game plays best in the Chrome browser. It is not mobile compatible. Please enjoy. :)

Keyboard Controls
WASD/ARROWS - Move
Space - Progress Text
Shift - Fun!

GamePad Controls
DPad - Move
A Button - Progress Text
B Button - Fun!

Video Gale is a VIRTUAL POP-UP BOOK. It's the story of Gale, an 86-year-old who wishes she was a video game. If you'd like us to make more chapters, please donate here or on our Patreon. All donations will go to the creation of future chapters.

Concept, story, and characters created by Ben Greene.  

Game design, music, and animation by Shadow64.  

2022 Searching for Treasure Inc. All rights reserved.
